title: ‘Difficult to Say’ if Vingegaard Haunted by Hangover of Two Huge Crashes, Says Long-Time Coach
content:
'Any rider who has children is considering what risks they take.' Vingegaard is healed from devastating injuries in Basque, concussion in Paris-Nice, but are there mental scars?

Read the full article at ‘Difficult to Say’ if Vingegaard Haunted by Hangover of Two Huge Crashes, Says Long-Time Coach on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
